West Bengal Teacher Salary 2025 - Complete Breakdown

Quick Overview: West Bengal Teacher officers earn ₹35400-112400 per month with 55000 current vacancies.

Salary Structure

Pay Level5-7
Salary Range₹35400-112400
Current Vacancies55000

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the starting salary of West Bengal Teacher?

The starting salary is ₹35400 per month.

How many vacancies are there for West Bengal Teacher?

There are currently 55000 vacancies available.
